text: 2020–21 Eerste Klasse is an upcoming Eerste Klasse season. The teams will be identical or near-identical to the 2019–20 Eerste Klasse season, after the COVID-19 pandemic in the Netherlands caused the KNVB to decide that there would be no relegation and promotion following the previous season. The league is scheduled to commence on 22 August for the Saturday sections and 23 August for the Sunday sections.https://www.voetbal247.nl/knvb-maakt-startdatum- seizoen-2020-2021-bekend/ == Saturday sections == Participating clubs are:https://www.knvb.nl/downloads/sites/bestand/knvb/23133/indelingen-1e-klasse- standaard-2020-2021 === A: West I === * Amsterdamsche FC * Argon * BOL * Die Haghe *
